title.value: Влияние быков-производителей импортной селекции на уровень молочной продуктивности коров
Influence of bulls-manufacturers of import selection on a level of cows dairy efficiency
Influence of bulls-manufacturers of import selection on a level of cows dairy efficiency

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Minina, N.G., Grodno State Agrarian Univ. (Belarus)

abstract.value: The use of Holstein selection servicing bulls from Western European countries, Canada, and the USA in Belarusian milk herds contributes to the Belarusian Black-and-White breed's gene material enrichment and cows' productivity growth. Researches were spent to OS 'Vasilishki' Shchuchinsky district of the Grodno area. 3 groups of animals with the finished lactation on 25 heads in everyone have been generated. Dairy efficiency of first heifers of various origins has been studied on such parameters, as a yield of milk for 305 days of lactation, the maximum daily yield of milk, the contents of fat and protein in milk, quantity of dairy fat. Besides this at first heifers of the selected groups have been considered: alive weight, milkeness factor, duration and stability of lactation, the udder form and speed of letting down of milk.  The research proves that the highest level of milk productivity was registered among the daughters of Holstein servicing bulls of Canadian and American selection whose milk yield after the first complete lactation averaged 7,313 kg and 6,135.93 kg with 4.02% and 3.96% of fat, 3.33% and 3.31% of protein respectively.
